Summary: This is a series of actions the will help you set up correctly for the day.  Things to do: 1. Have you turned the alarm off 2. Unlock Cool Room B 3. Turn on light to Coolroom B,C & D 4. Unlock Coolroom C 5. Collect personal items that you will need throughout the morning PEN, RADIO,KNIFE & THERMOMETER

Short_description: Check Answering machine for overnight orders & Invoice
Summary: Check Answering machine for overnight orders -

Turn ON Production Room Refrigeration  Reason we do this is to precool the area ready for prodcution to begin by 5am. Especially critical through NOV - MAR  Things to look out for: 1. All doors on the production floor are closed you MUSt walk around and check. 2. Switch on the remaining displays panels found opposite time clock. 3. The turn of fresh air fans found to the right of the time clock and close covers.

Check / Print Invoice -  This task is very importatnt because customers can order online which wont be picked up unless you run this report. Finding an invoice in the system as you are loading a truck can make your job very stressful so running this report is very important.

Short_description: Print WV Shorts report & Print labels
Summary: Print WV Shorts report & Print labels.  Using the software "UniFresh Labels normal" print labels ensuring the dates are packed on the same day as dispatch.   Check production tray for labels that have already been printed.

Print Driver Load report -  This is the report drivers use to check there quantities before loading.  The report is under the distribution tab in Ostendo " Driver Load Report" select day nd print.  Note: If nothing shows up, it means that the order hasn't be picked in the picking software.

Organise Load allocations  There are additional deliveries that can be done by our regular Metro Deliveries.  This is the list: NORTH - Dennis, Broken Hill NORTH EAST/CITY EAST - San Remo, Gallipo. CITY SOUTH, CENTRAL, SOUTH - Vilis

Short_description: Load Early Morning HS Fresh/ Market Truck SB94NP
Summary: Load Early Morning SunFresh/ Market Truck SB94NP  Load in this order: 1.Market return 2. Central Fruit 3. Auscold 4. AMJ 5. Musico 6. Sunraysia 7. SunFresh 7. Woolworths
Record Packout Temperatures  This is a quality requirement, the form is number #18 and is found just outside the quality office
No Summary
Start up for fridge Area  This is used as feebcak to the pick pack dept about the state of the fridge at the end of their shift.

Short_description: Orientate myself with where everything is
Summary: Orientate myself with where everything is - By now you should have allocated the Loads but now you need to coordinate with the stock associatted with the invoice.

Short_description: Orientate myself with where everything is
Summary: Orientate myself with where everything is - By now you should have allocated the Loads but now you need to coordinate with the stock associatted with the invoice.

Complete SHORTS for Metro Runs  Convert all the shotrs from the software onto boxes completes with Box and product labels ready for drivers to take.  By the time you convert the SHORTS the software should be green and the trolley should have labelled boxes

Short_description: Load Blue Lake on Early Morning Truck
Summary: Load Blue Lake on Early Morning Truck

Short_description: Set out fridge ready for drivers to check off Load
Summary: Set out pallets 500mm apart for drivers to be able to walk around and check product.  Store North, North East, City East, Gawler & South in CR C  Store CBD, Central, City South & All KFC in CR B  BlueLake transport in CR A
Test
Run daily report from Ostendo then input into the daily Report
Check clock in and out times to ensure breaks are being taken. Every employee situation is not the same but if something obvious shows up you can email the adjust to Carolina
Show Summary Analyse Daily Roster Carolina will email a daily roster which will give you a comparison of actual hours worked vs Rostered hours. Analyse and provide feedback to department leaders.

Short_description: Check Outlook Calendar for appointments & Events
Summary: Check appointments and task in preparation to those events

Short_description: Take A Picture Of 20 Washed Black UniFresh Pallets In Coolroom B In South West Corner
Summary: Wash 20 black plastic pallets. Things to look out for. 1. Wash base well 2. Remove all damaged equipment to be repaired Onced cleaned place in Cool room B in the South West corner in stacks of 5 high.,
Using the MASTER Jobs list found on the maintenance folder
This is a reminder to check the Quality Meeting notes for tasks assigned to you

This is a function where we update the actual purchases prices in the daily report and change them for dynamic to static values for historic purposes. Updates 1. Purchase Prices 2. Sales Data 3. Sales Data 4. BOMS
Check bank account amounts to get an idea of cashlow
Check bank account to see if any payment require authorization

Short_description: Respond to CARS in Teams platform
Summary: Respond to CARS in Teams platform https://unifreshprocessors.sharepoint.com/sites/Quality/Lists/Internal%20CAR%20Register?env=WebViewList
Click on the folowing linkl to see SOP for forklift

Shut down the Forklift (Crown) Things to look out for 1. That you charge the unit if charge is less than 50% 2.Parked in the designated area 3. All rubbish has been removed 4.Confirm that charging unit has begun charge cycle.

Short_description: Clean up the front car park with air blower
Summary: -Clean up the front car park with air blower  -Take photos of the clean car park
Was the hand powered pallet jack that production staff use.
To weed the entire fence line are of UniFresh. Equipment 9Lsprayer is in garden shed on North fenceline behind main shed. Ratio  Ratio100ml Roundup to 9L sprayer.
Please clean smoking area and empty cans bin
To keep UF Grey bins in good order

Wash Forklift 1.Drive forklift to the high pressure wash bay .2.Cover dashboard and hoist controls with plastic bag. 3. Use truck wash, chlorofoam and brush to clean the forklifts. 4.Then, use high pressure to clean the unit. 5.Wipe down hoist controls and dashboard with a rag
Read main meter in front South West cnr carpark.  Plus discharge meter in sump area inside control box
Check level of Orange juice bins and make sure we have at least 15 bins ready for packing on Wednesday.  Best to buy 3 lots of 6 on Mon,Wed & Fri
This is to check on chemetall chemcial levels   We order once per Month
Take a stocktake and place orders for the next 4 weeks
Open up approved supplier matrix and check for any Certs that have expiried
Check stocktake levels   Enter stock take numbers into Ostendo  Run 2 day production report for
Check Production Orders Range sheet is gives you all the planned production for the day  This is to make sure all volume is ready in CR A  This comes vis email from production manager

Short_description: Check all POs for the week & Close
Summary: Run a filter for all open POs for the current month & check for invoices to close,if the invoice is not in request via email
Print out POs from Ostendo  And fill out FORM115A Daily Sheet for the following day
Using the production software SALAD- Covino  Send 5 day PO through via email  Plus send Subway WA orders

Short_description: Cabbage order for the following week
Summary: Send an order to Pellicone for cabbage after stocktake numbers are in.
check tesa tape level we use 10 rolls per month Armsrong Packaging
Order the next lot of carrots for the following month, one order on Wed per week.
Check stock level for the following items Blue Bin Liners  100 per week 10 Kg Blue Bags on Roll 2500 per week 15 Kg Blue Bags on Roll 50 per week Lifespan Rewind Natural 5 Rolls per
Order the next lot of  Mayo buckets.
Order the next lot of mushrooms for the following week, we order 1 pallet Mon and Thurday deliveries
Check stock levels for all chemcials stored in SR B
Open Velpic and do training modules

Short_description: Lettuce,Celery & Potato POs for next week
Summary: Send POs to all lettuce growers for the following week.
order weekly amount from CCP
On Purchasing screen there is Pivot- Purchasing History on bottom left hand corner.  Run report for last 7 days of entries.  Export to excel sheet and convert all
Check staff room for following items Milk, coffee,tea,bread,salt,pepper,butter and check boardroom for fresh milk

Short_description: WA Subway Stock Level Check and order
Summary: Check WA Teams stocktake update to run purchasing report

Start in CR A, B, D, C then back shed.  Walk through all coolrooms once a day. You are checking for aged stock anything over 7 days plus general tidyness. Talk to forklift operators about stock roataion.
You are checking for aged stock anything over 7 days plus general tidyness. Talk to forklift operators about stock roataion.
Check in outlook under QA compliants and send credits to supplier for the week
Check first aid level in the first aid cupboard   Order from Industrial First Aid online store
Check stock take and order eggs for Wednesday delivery
Print and enter +check market transport docket

Short_description: LAST! Shopping List to Whatsapp group
Summary: Use Purchaing Report and printed POs in the production tray to bulid shopping list for new 3 days
Look at short report and adjusted ordering to minimise shorts in the future
Order Spring Onions and Parsley for Tuesday delivery
Raise POs for weeks supply into Perth and email through to supplier
Print out all chep emails for the week and sign off to check amounts correct number is written on market shopping list on the back and on UF receivables sheet
Restart the server according to standard guideline
Test
Test 2
Check to see if we have enough stock to fulfill next 2 days of orders in CR C, This is a report in Teams under PURCHASING GENERAL FILES Subway stock take in excel
